BecomeTranslator: Unfortunately the questionnaire is not yet available in this language. If you are able to translate texts from German/English into your language then please contact us by _email_.
HeadLine: Patient self-assessment
Introduction: Do you have a COVID-19 infection? This questionnaire will help you to assess your risk. Use the PDF, which you can print out at the end, as a template for a telephone consultation with your doctor.
InfectionRiskDetails: Your assessment of your current health status and contact with the COVID-19 virus.
InfectionRiskGreen: Congratulations: It looks like you are healthy. Take good care of yourself and protect yourself and others.
InfectionRiskYellow: Take it easy and observe her symptoms.
InfectionRiskRed: Protect yourself and your fellow humans through isolation. Call your local advice centre.
RiskGroupDetails: Your current health status with regards to those factors which may pose an additional risk when infected with the COVID-19 virus.
RiskGroupGreen: Wonderful! According to your assessment, you are healthy. Take good care of yourself.
RiskGroupYellow: According to your assessment, you have some risks. Take care of yourself and stay home.
RiskGroupRed: Please protect yourself and your roommates from infection. In any case, stay at home.
AddYourNamePrivacyMessage: This data is only visible to you. The printout serves as a guide for a telephone call to your doctor or the Corona Hotline. Take it with you to the examination appointment.
PleaseEnterYourText: Personal information, medication that your doctor should know about.
